WorkItem.Description: When an update is selected, in the "Informations" tab, double-clicking in the "Folder" or "Id" textbox should open an Explorer to this directory
WorkItem.Summary: Go to the file location on double-clicking

Comments.Message: Implemented the events. Add colorizing when the destination folder/file doesn't exit. Orange for the UpdateServicesPackages and Red for the WsusContent.
When multiselecting updates, The backcolor of the textbox may be wrong. Should put the backcolor of the textbox to default color when multiselecting updates.
